net.jawr.web.config.jmx

Class JawrConfigManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.config.jmx.JawrConfigManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JawrConfigManagerMBean

    public class JawrConfigManager
extends Object
implements JawrConfigManagerMBean
    This class defines the MBean which manage the Jawr configuration for a servlet.
    Author:
    Ibrahim Chaehoi
